alert.note: Alert for Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorms with very heavy rain will impact portions of eastern Ontario County through 530 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms extending from near Geneva southwestward to Bristol, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Clifton Springs, Phelps, Rushville, Gorham, Manchester, Shortsville, Seneca Lake State Park, Port Gibson, Seneca Castle, Cheshire, Cottage City, Bristol Mountain, Hall, and West Junius. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 42 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
